heading: HB00231
0: AN ACT TO INSTITUTIONALIZE AND ENCOURAGE PARTNERSHIPS BETWEEN AGRICULTURE VILLAGE FARM MANAGEMENT (AVFM) ENTERPRISES AND SMALL HOLD FARMERS AND FISHERFOLKS IN ORDER TO HASTEN THE DOUBLING OF RURAL HOUSEHOLD INCOMES THROUGH THEIR ADOPTION BETTER PRODUCTION, PROCESSING, MARKETING, LOGISTICS AND FINANCING TECHNOLOGIES, AND BY ESTABLISHING ECONOMIES OF SCALE THROUGH SYNCHRONIZED COMMUNITY AGRICULTURE AND CONSOLIDATION OF PRODUCTION, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2019-07-23
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00231
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO INSTITUTIONALIZE AND ENCOURAGE PARTNERSHIPS BETWEEN AGRICULTURE VILLAGE FARM MANAGEMENT (AVFM) ENTERPRISES AND SMALL HOLD FARMERS AND FISHERFOLKS IN ORDER TO HASTEN THE DOUBLING OF RURAL HOUSEHOLD INCOMES THROUGH THEIR ADOPTION BETTER PRODUCTION, PROCESSING, MARKETING, LOGISTICS AND FINANCING TECHNOLOGIES, AND BY ESTABLISHING ECONOMIES OF SCALE THROUGH SYNCHRONIZED COMMUNITY AGRICULTURE AND CONSOLIDATION OF PRODUCTION, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

DATE FILED : 2019-07-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
